long_description: Designed to seat you in an upright and comfortable position for city streets, scenic paths or commuting, our Novara Forza bike smooths out unexpected bumps with its shock-absorbing fork. Relaxed design puts you in a fully upright position, optimizing comfort and steering control as well as visibility in every direction. Suspension fork provides 63mm of travel to smooth out rough roads; you can lock the suspension out when it isn't needed to increase control. Flat bar puts your hands in a natural position to reduce strain. 27 smooth-shifting gears let you spin easy no matter the terrain or grade. Tektro brakes and levers offer confident speed management. Comfort-oriented grips and bar ends help support hands. Freedom Ryder Sport tires and Weinmann rims provide a smooth-rolling ride for cruising efficiently along roads and bike lanes. Accommodates a rear rack and fenders front and back (not included), making the Forza great for commuting or running errands. Specs on our Novara Forza bike are subject to change.
